name: German trans-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected German translations of Greek and Latin works.
body:
#Welcome to german_trans-dev!

##About
This repository contains machine-corrected German translations of public-domain Greek and Latin works.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Jouve](http://jouve.com/en), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the texts in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents

###Greek
* Lykurgos. _[Rede gegen Leokrates](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/german_trans-dev/blob/master/lycurgus_1869.xml)_, Übersetzt von Hermann Bender (1869) Stuttgart: Hoffmann.
* Thukydides. _[Geschichte des Peloponnesischen Krieges](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/german_trans-dev/blob/master/thucydides_1_1917.xml)_ [Vol. 1], Übertragen von Theodor Braun (1917) Leipzig: Insel-Verlag.
* Thukydides. _[Geschichte des Peloponnesischen Krieges](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/german_trans-dev/blob/master/thucydides_2_1917.xml)_ [Vol. 2], Übertragen von Theodor Braun (1917) Leipzig: Insel-Verlag.
* Thukydides. _[Geschichte des Peloponnesischen Krieges](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/german_trans-dev/blob/master/thucydides_1_1864.xml)_ [Vol. 1], Übertragen von Adolf Wahrmund (1864) Stuttgart: Krais & Hoffmann.

###Latin
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
